name: Absoloot Hostel Queenstown
description:
Christmas Restriction
- No Check ins or check outs on Christmas Eve or Christmas Day. Any reservation made to check-in or check-out on these date will be cancelled. 

Absoloot Hostel QT welcomes you with a variety of accommodation options for the independent travelers, families and groups alike.  With the best location in Queenstown, you will get to enjoy the convenience, view, and quality that you only get from a stay with your friends here at Absoloot.

Designed by travelers, for travelers, AbsolootQT is owner-operated and equipped with everything you could ask for.  Have breakfast in the best hostel kitchen in New Zealand, talk to our staff for advice on the coolest adventures around, and sleep in comfort in sustainably designed custom beds with power-points and reading lights at your finger tips. Some of our multi person rooms can also be booked privately for families, triples and couples. 

If you need more privacy, take a look into our Queen and Double configurations, and enjoy the sort of comfort some hotels don not even provide.  You can also enjoy peace of mind from the fact you are in an accommodation provider that cares, with sustainable practices employed across the accommodation to keep our environmental impact to a minimum.

Each room has been fitted with double-glazing and shutters to keep the heat in and the noise out. And there's a heat pump/reverse-cycle air-conditioner in every room, so you can stay warm in Winter and cool in Summer.  Multi person room guests can enjoy fully-made beds with toasty duvets (doonas), large individual lockers for every bed, key-card door access, individual reading lamps and power-points, and Free Unlimited Wi-Fi throughout the property.  En-suite rooms have a fully-equipped bathroom including hair and body wash, as well as an in-room LCD TV, and 4 person en-suite rooms come equipped with a fridge as well. Borrow a free fresh towel from reception if you have forgotten your own, free earplugs if you are a light sleeper, and free smiles all day long!

Speaking of smiles, you will have one all over your face once you step into our guest kitchen after taking one look at that view.  Grab a free coffee, tea or hot chocolate, spice up your life with free spices while cooking on quality electric stove tops and ovens in a fully-equipped kitchen, and lose yourself in daydreams about the experiences available on your doorstep.

On the down days, take a moment to sort those dirty clothes out in our commercial on-site Laundromat with brand-new machines.  Then while you are getting your life in order, you can relax in our 24hr lounge room, equipped with a Nintendo Wii, XBox 360, board games, book exchange, and a travel nook to book the next leg of your journey.  An LCD TV for video games and a Smart TV for your Netflix and Chill should stop any arguments about what is on, but that is only if you haven not taken advantage of the adventure deals available from the team at reception there is no excuses to not get the most out of your Queenstown experience.

So just get in touch with the team at Absoloot QT and meet your travel family in your home away from home!

Reception is open between 9am and 9pm. Check-in is 3pm. Check out it between 9am and 10am.

Late Check-ins: If you plan to arrive after 9pm, please get in touch and we can organise a late check-in for you. 

Special Note: FAMILY ROOM:
Please Note - Standard 5 share FAMILY room
No more than two adults allowed per room
2 adults 3 children Max
This room is for FAMILIES ONLY

houseRules.notes:
Christmas Restriction
- No Check ins or check outs on Christmas Eve or Christmas Day. Any reservation made to check-in or check-out on these date will be cancelled. 

- Contact Details
You must provide a contact number AND email address when making a booking. We reserve the right to cancel a reservation where we have not been given full contact details.

Payment Methods
- Credit and Paywave (contactless) payments incur a surcharge of 2.75% of your total on check in/out to help cover the cost of our fees. There is no surcharge for inserted EFTPOS cards or cash payments.

If at any point we are required or forced to charge the credit card you have used to make your reservation, for reasons including, but not limited to, damages, no-shows, cancellations or modifications, a third-party transaction fee of 3.7% of the total amount plus $0.30 will apply.

No Shows
- In case of a 'no show', when you do not show up for your reservation, the credit card provided will be charged the full rate of the whole reservation. We consider a 'No Show' to be anyone that does not attend their reservation, or does not notify us of their intention to not attend their confirmed reservation until after check-in time on the day their reservation begins.

Family Rooms (Standard 5 share FAMILY room)
- No more than two adults allowed per room.
- 2 adults 3 children Max
- Adult age is 18 years and over.

Guests under 18 years
- If your are travelling with people 17 or under and you wish to stay in a dorm configuration, we require your reservation to book out the entire dorm. Should you not do so, we will require you to upgrade to a private room, if available, and pay any additional costs, or find alternative accommodation and our cancellation/ no show policy will apply.

Cancellations
- All cancellation scenarios mentioned below do not include the amount that has been paid to Hostelworld as a deposit at the time of booking and only includes the amount you owe Absoloot Hostel Queenstown, as stated on your booking confirmation.

- Conditions/Cancellation policies for bookings with less than 10 people/ beds and less than 7 nights: 
Cancellations and modifications are allowed free of change, up to 7 days  in advance of check-in time date. Cancellation within 7 days of your check-in date will be charged the first night's charge. Cancellations within 2 days of your check-in date will be charged in full. A 'No Show', as mentioned above, will be charged the full price of their reservation to the credit card provided at the time of booking.

- Conditions/Cancellation policies for bookings more than 7 nights and less than 10 guests/ beds:
Cancellations and changes may be made to the booking up to 7 days prior to your reservation date at no charge. Cancellations made within 7 nights and 48 hours from your check-in time will be charged the first night's rate to the credit card provided at the time of booking. Cancellations made within 48 hours of your check-in time will be charged the first week's rate. 'No Shows' as mentioned above, will be charged the first week's rate to the credit card provided at the time of booking. 

- Conditions/Cancellation policies for group bookings that have 10 people/ beds or more (but less than 20):
Cancellations and changes may be made to the booking up to 14 days prior to the arrival date at no charge. Cancellations between 14 days and 48 hours before your check-in time will be charged the first night's rate to the credit card details provided when making your booking. Cancellations and changes made within 48 hours will be charged the full rate of the whole reservation to the credit card details provided when making your booking. 'No Shows' as mentioned above, will be charged in full to the credit card provided at time of booking.

- Conditions/Cancellation policies for group bookings that have 20 people/ beds or more:
Cancellations and changes may be made to the booking up to 28 days prior to the arrival date at no charge. Cancellations between 28 days and 14 days before your reservation date will be charged the first night's rate to the credit card details provided when making your booking. Cancellations and changes made within 14 nights and 48 hours of your check-in time will be charged 50% of the whole reservation cost to the credit card details provided when making your booking. Cancellations made within 48 hours of your check-in time will be charged the full cost of the reservation to the credit card provided when making your booking.

Check In and Check Out Times
Guests may check-in from 3.00pm on their arrival date and must check out by 10.00am on their departure date.

Reception is manned between 9am and 9pm. If you plan to arrive around 9pm or after, please notify us in advance of your check-in so that we can arrange this. Check-in is 3pm. If you arrive before 3pm, you will still have full access to the hostels facilities including Kitchen, Showers, TV Room, Laundry and Luggage Storage. We will let you in to allow you to use our facilities including guest kitchen, bathroom, wifi, TV lounge, laundry and luggage storage until you can check in.

Cleaning and Damages
- The guest/s will be responsible for damage to the premises or loss of or damage to any items in the premises and will be required to pay the cost of replacement or repair of any such item damaged or lost. A minimum $200 charge will apply, and any cost over and above this - including the cost of rooms/beds rendered unusable due to extraneous damages/cleaning - will be charged accordingly.

Use of Premises
- At no time during the occupancy shall more than the number of persons shown on the confirmation reside overnight at the premises, without the prior consent of the property managers, whereupon extra charges will be made.  We are a strictly non-smoking facility, and smoking in the premises will render your reservation cancelled, and a minimum charge of $1000 will apply.

Personal Property
- No responsibility is taken for guests personal property left on the premises.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
